text: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Extraction (originally known as Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Quarantine) is an online multiplayer tactical shooter video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft as a spin-off of Rainbow Six Siege (2015). The game was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Amazon Luna, Google Stadia, Xbox One and Xbox Series X and Series S on January 20, 2022. It received mixed reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2022 video games Category:Ubisoft games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Hero shooters Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Tactical shooters Category:Video games about alien invasions Category:Video games about police officers Category:Video games about the Special Air Service Category:Video games about the United States Navy SEALs Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Extraction
